articles.author: Kurt Helin
articles.title: WNBA Playoffs 2024: Schedule, how does it work, format, bracket, rounds, past winners - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: New York has been the best team all season, but defending champs Las Vegas is lurking, as are Caitlin Clark and Indiana.
articles.content:
What has been an unrivaled, wildly popular WNBA season now heads to its brightest spotlight the playoffs.
The New York Liberty have been the best team in the W all season, but the two-time defending… [+6727 chars]
